options.pvplegacyutils.stats: Right-click for stats of a player
options.pvplegacyutils.stats_middleclick: Internally uses the Pick Block functionality,
Make sure you have Pick Block bound to a key.
options.pvplegacyutils.duel: Notify when someone invites you to a duel
options.pvplegacyutils.invite: Notify when someone invites you to a party
options.pvplegacyutils.ten_vs_ten: Notify when a ?v? game is starting
options.pvplegacyutils.leave_explicit.to: You can still do it by
to check a kit of a sign,
or to re-queue in another sign.
options.pvplegacyutils.leftclick_leave: Left-click on a sign to leave a queue
